meanings.definition: One of the external openings of the nasal cavity in vertebrates.
meanings.sent2: She felt a tickle in her naris.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat sniffed at the naris of the statue.
meanings.sent4: The forest was alive with the whispers of the wind through every naris.
meanings.sent5: The naris of the dragon was as wide as a dinner plate.

meanings.sent1: His left naris was slightly larger than the right one.
meanings.sent2: The scent entered her naris and triggered a memory.
meanings.sent3: The sneezing contest was won by the naris with the most ticklish sensation.
meanings.sent4: Her naris flared in anger at the pungent smell.
meanings.sent5: The naris of the elephant could suck up water like a vacuum cleaner.
